page.title: 07A Carrot Factory & A Builder
page.content:
The carrot factory has a lot of vegetables. The tractors there are very big and I am scared of them. They have big yellow trailers and I keep out of the way. The farmers take their vegetables to the factory to be cleaned and sorted. Charlie Lingham
My Dad is a builder. He drives a big digger and he digs holes. Today my Dad is making concrete. When it rains the site gets muddy and he gets stuck so all the mates help him. Then he has dinner and after a while he comes home for tea. Marie Easey
